articles.description:
RT Dawn Kelly 🏳️‍🌈⛰️🚢
Even if you aren't building in Abstraction Hack, this will be a cool look at the possibilities of composable frontends with @NEARProtocol 
NEAR + D_D = ❤️‍🔥
I'll be there (noon EST today) and I hope you will, too!

Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): Today is our @NearProtocol #ChainAbstraction Workshop Part 2 ⚒
Join us at 5pm UTC and learn about composable decentralized frontends with our host @wc49358 🤓
Don't miss it! ⏳
Youtube link ⤵

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Wanna build multi-chain DApps? ⚒
 Read Ini's latest piece 🤓

Ini Abasi Ekanem: 🔹Chain Abstraction: Connecting Blockchains🔹
Web3 is limited due to difficult onboarding, and complexities like wallet creation, seed phrase management, and language barriers.
With Chain Abstraction, the complexity of web3 goes to zero.
Read my post: https://open.substack.com/pub/iniabasiekanem/p/chain-abstraction-connecting-blockchains?r=4g7qb&utm_campaign=post&utm_medium=web&showWelcome=true
articles.title: Wanna build multi-chain DApps? ⚒ Read Ini's latest piece 🤓
